column5: Just a heads up that Belwood Lake near Fergus opens for ice fishing on Friday.  No hut rentals anymore but bait and tackle are available.  $5.50 per adult to fish $2.75 for kids.  Easy walk from the parking lot down onto the ice.  Call Park office for details. 1-519-843-2979 Dan O.

My 11yo daughter has been bugging me to get her out but I was hoping Valens or Pinehurst.  Neither of those will be open this weekend.  How is Belwood for fish volumes?  I really need a spot that can give consistent action (like Pinehurst for bluegill).  One pike for the day will not do it for her lol....  Burt
if u want action don't go to Belwood
Make the drive, go to Gilford on Simcoe. You'll never have a dull moment.
A freind took me belwood once.  ...never fished with that guy since
How is the parking situation at Gilford?  Or parking at any other recommended area right now on Simcoe?  Never fished it.... and we would have to walk out...  Burt
Just read that Shades Mills will be open tomorrow, I think I will take her there.  Burt
Belwood lake is literally 10 min from my house and I will only go their to test my boat. If you want fish....go somewhere else
Any advice on fishing shades mills?Never been, thinking of trying next week
Follow the crowds... Its a city out there
